name: places/ChIJ1cTsjIpYwokRTzWJYXUcrac
formattedAddress: 154 W 70th St #200, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 154 W 70th St #200, New York, NY 10023, USA

originalText.text: Almost qualifies for no stars. I’ll give one star for the three good doormen: Jerry, Carlos, and Max. Other than those guys, the building management and staff is completely incompetent. No live-in super, unacceptable for a 150+ unit building. Had no gas for over a month and the building never gave an honest timeline on how soon we’d get it back. Never any talk about adjusting the rent for the month everyone had to eat out. Windows are single pane and drafty, letting in lots of outside noise and air. Heat barely worked in the winter - apartment was often below 60 degrees. Would move asap if moving wasn’t such a pain.

originalText.text:
I recently moved here and came down with severe respiratory problems.

After 2 months of doctor visits, I checked the building provided air conditioning  and discovered they were infested with mold. (please see pictures below which were taken AFTER I vacuumed the dust out)

The building does not maintain the units and will not take responsibility

originalText.text: Current resident. Have not had gas hook up for stove/oven/dryer in over a month. Communication is poor and building only giving 5% back on rent.

originalText.text: Great doormen, amazing roof deck, superb value for money and friendly management team
